---
title: "Collegiate Track and Field Data Science Insights"
---

This was my final project in my data science course from Fall 2023. The project involved finding an enticing data set and making fascinating insights and visual displays. I analyzed the last 14 years of the Division III New England Region Track and Field Championships, Amherst's Indoor championship meet. Below is my shiny app interface. See which events have been dominated by which schools, and how significant the margins of improvement are from year to year.
